Posts.Content: Don't we worried that you are having trouble coping both my wife and I have had this difficulty and still to a certain degree still have. I am the one that is being treated for cancer. You will find there is a vast amount of support out there and the best thing that we have found is talking to each other about the way we feel There is a great supporters club out there who are only to willing to help you All my best wishes Tony
Posts.Title: Trouble coping
